name: COM. ex rel. Antonio BUNDY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary Jeffrey A. Beard, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Com. ex rel. Bundy v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: COM. ex rel. Antonio BUNDY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary Jeffrey A. Beard, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of June, 2010, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

995 A.2d 1183
